summary: Two mismatched sets of identical twins, one aristocrat, one peasant, mistakenly exchange identities on the eve of the French Revolution.
cast: Gene Wilder|Donald Sutherland|Hugh Griffith|Jack MacGowran|Billie Whitelaw|Victor Spinetti|Ewa Aulin|Helen Fraser|Rosalind Knight|Harry Fowler|Murray Melvin|Ken Parry|Maxwell Shaw|Jacques Maury|Graham Stark|Barry Lowe|George A. Cooper|Michael Rothwell|Denise Coffey|Orson Welles|Tina Brown|Walker Edmiston
keywords: king louis xvi|voice over narration|farce|fish out of water|snobbery
title: Empiecen la revolución sin mí
